dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3657 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide headstones and markers for the graves of spouses and children of veterans who are buried in tribal cemeteries.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Poliquin introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide headstones and markers for the graves of spouses and children of veterans who are buried in tribal cemeteries.

section.header: Eligibility of spouses and children of veterans buried in tribal cemeteries for Department of Veterans Affairs headstones and markers
section.text: Section 2306(a)(4) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting or a tribal organization after State.
